title: cryptoxchange
author: cryptoxchange
content: Dear Trade Hill Clients,Crypto X Change would like to offer a $5.00 USD Credit for migrating to Crypto X Change, this is only if you move your funds via BitInstant to prove that you are a Trade Hill Client.Once you have successfully created an account and moved your funds across, our staff will credit your account with $5.00 USD.The only way for us to provide this offer and prevent any scams is via our BitInstant API connection.We also have 0% Trade Fee's from now until the 22nd of February for everyone!Why are we offering this? As an offer for the Bitcoin community to come and try Crypto X Change, and assist with the ease of switching exchanges.You will need to create a Crypto X Change account at www.cryptoxchange.com and then move your funds via www.bitinstant.comWithin 48 Hours of creating an account / moving funds via BitInstant your account will be credited $5.00 USDIf you have any problems or questions please do not hesitate to contact us via email, online support or phone.*One credit of $5.00 USD per person & must be verified as a Trade Hill client via the BitInstant transfer*Thank you,RegardsCrypto X Change
